name: Cyber Shooter (shammi hembrom, IndieDev007)
description:
Created for BYOG 2021

All themes used:

(RESET, Two Views, Minimal Interaction)

- Level RESETs if the player runs out of time or dies

- Game has 2 views, FRONT, and SIDE, player can switch between both to reveal hidden objects.

- Game has minimal interaction, only uses the mouse to aim, left click to shoot, right-click to change view.

The game is set in a pixel cyber-themed world. The objective is to find the key. The player destroys objects to find the key. Objects are cleverly hidden, to reveal objects player has to switch views, and can only interact with objects in a particular view.

Beware, some objects contain enemies hidden inside them, which shoot back.
